title: Problem with fps (don't scroll if you can help tho)
body: So i have a pretty nice pc i was streaming witcher 3 on ultra without any lag and never had problems with droping fps on league. The funny part is that fullscreen works fine it's just the windowed borderless. Like i said i never had problems with that and i don;t know where to start (obviously i updated my drivers right away when i saw what was happening) So please help because it looks ridiculous when this pc is running league with 20fps (i need the windowed borderless so i can alt tab out once in a while to check on stuff) So yeah.. Would appreciate any help! {{champion:32}}

replies.body:
It sounds like League may not be running off your dedicated GPU, causing your FPS instability and low FPS. I strongly recommend going through the steps in our [**Framerate Troubleshooting Guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) in their entirety, to ensure League can launch off your correct GPU.

Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Tried it all and it didn't help. Submited a ticket and thanks for the help.
